title: Software Engineer, Mobile - SDE1
description:
Join our growing Mobile Engineering team to expand and scale our ever-evolving e-commerce platform. We are looking for an exceptional Senior Engineer Mobile who can help us drive our mobile roadmap forward. You will help build critical enhancements to our mobile app and have significant influence in how we build out a robust roadmap this year to engage our customers and drive revenue. Our current platform uses a combination of Shopify Contentful and custom built APIs to deliver a world-class web-based experience. We want to take those same services and use them to build a world-class mobile application. 
What You’ll Do:

Help design build and implement consumer facing features for our new FIGS mobile application
Create compelling in-app experiences that will reach thousands of users globally
Collaborate with product manager engineers and design team to influence the roadmap and product development 
Contribute to internal shared frameworks and libraries

About You:

Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience or education
1+ years working on mobile applications for iOS 
Strong computer science fundamentals
Extensive experience with Swift & Swift UI -- Objective-C experience is also a good bonus
A preference for TDD-style development over YDD (YOLO driven development)
Experience building adaptive user interfaces in iOS
Experience working with REST and GraphQL backend service layers
Awareness of common security vulnerabilities and how to avoid them
Demonstrated ability to architect scalable and maintainable applications

Bonus points for:

Experience with mobile test automation frameworks like Appium or EarlGrey
Experience working with an e-commerce framework like Shopify BigCommerce or WooCommerce
Experience setting up CI/CD build processes and pipelines

What You’ll Bring:

Excellent communication skills
Collaboration: we work in small cross-functional teams and as individual engineers. We are not afraid of challenges and working together to tackle them
Positive attitude: we are self-starters who love to solve problems with technologies
A strong work ethic integrity and an ownership mindset

FIGS Compensation and Benefits
Pay Range

At FIGS your base salary is one part of your total compensation package. This roles base salary range is between $94500 and $135000. Actual base salary is determined based on a number of factors including but not limited to your relevant skills qualifications and years of experience. 

Additional Compensation and Benefits 

Equity: All FIGS employees have the opportunity to own shares of FIGS stock through our new-hire equity program. Additionally FIGS provides a discount when purchasing FIGS stock voluntarily through our FIGS Employee Stock Purchase Plan  


Other compensation and benefits offered include: 

Comprehensive benefits and perks package focused on your well-being including premium medical dental and vision coverage and full access to wellness services through Ginger Headspace and Gympass. 100% FIGS-sponsored life insurance and disability insurance  
Amazing 401(k) program with a company match up to the first 6% of your contribution
Generous paid time off - We have 11 company holidays. For salaried team members we offer flexible vacation. For our hourly team members we offer up to 3 weeks of accrued vacation
Meaningful time away for baby bonding including parental leave new  parent care meals and a transition back to work for primary caregivers
FIGS Friends and Family 25% off Discount for FIGS apparel
Access to FIGS Vet Discounted Pet Daycare and so much more…


*Benefits eligibility is determined by hour requirements and length of service 
 
A little bit about us…
FIGS Inc. is a founder-led direct-to-consumer healthcare apparel and lifestyle brand that seeks to celebrate empower and serve current and future generations of healthcare professionals. We redefine what scrubs are by creating technically advanced apparel and products that feature an unmatched combination of comfort durability function and style all at an affordable price. With the largest DTC platform in healthcare apparel we sell our products to a rapidly growing community of loyal customers. Through these customer relationships FIGS has built a community and lifestyle around a profession revolutionizing the large and fragmented healthcare apparel market and becoming the industry’s category-defining healthcare apparel and lifestyle brand.
Our Threads for Threads initiative is integral to our mission to improve the lives of healthcare professionals on a global scale. Founded alongside FIGS in 2013 Threads for Threads donates scrubs to healthcare professionals working in resource-poor countries around the world.

Ability to write well designed tested and maintainable code

Curiosity and willingness to jump into unfamiliar codebases

title: Senior Security Operations Engineer

description:
Were revolutionizing the fitness & wellness industry and we’re looking for talented people to help us do it. Your role 
As Manager Security Engineering you will be responsible for the management of the Cyber Security Operations and Engineering team and executing the requirements and strategy of the Chief Information Security Officer. You are an experienced security engineer or analyst turned successful people leader who is passionate about creating impactful and high-quality security solutions. 
You’ll pursue continuous improvement to help Mindbody achieve its mission: Powering the world’s fitness and wellness businesses and connecting them with more consumers more effectively than anyone else.  
You will: 

Manage a team of security engineers and analysts while assisting them in furthering their careers through increased responsibility and impactful feedback Mindbody 
Be actively involved in strategic direction and decisions for your team 
Empower your security team to deliver a high level of technical quality and business impact.  
Identify creative ways to measure and track progress on the teams initiatives and promote learning from both successes and failures to a wider audience  
Strategic planning deployment and maintenance of a wide variety of security tools and technologies including vulnerability management SIEM and logging infrastructure Endpoint Protection Platforms (EPP) privileged account access management control and monitoring network security breach detection capabilities and software defined perimeters (SDP). 
Serve as a cyber security advisor to internal customers and leaders to ensure security processes and technology are integrated into product and enterprise environments  
Evaluate new security tools and technologies. Manage day to day relationships with key security vendors  
Continuously monitor systems for security control gaps designing effective and timely remediation initiatives with service owners  
Support and evangelize DevSecOps methodologies and frameworks in cloud and enterprise environments  
Serve as member of the Cyber Security Incident Response Team (CSIRT) and as a CSIRT Incident Commander  

 
About the right team member 
You are an experienced security engineer or analyst turned successful people leader who is passionate about creating impactful and high-quality security solutions. You know the best security is created through collaboration and iteration and youre looking for the right opportunity and the right team to expand your experience  
 You’ll thrive in this role with experience in: 

Proven ability to establish and articulate a vision set goals develop and execute  
3-6+ years information security and/or technology experience 1+ year leading a team preferred 
At least one of CISSP CISM or GSEC/GSLC preferred  
Familiarity with cloud security principles and implementing well-architected frameworks 
Technical expertise in detective and preventive solutions such as web application firewalls endpoint protection intrusion detection vulnerability management and security logging and analysis  
Experience with monitoring systems such as Splunk Elastic Stack or Chronicle  
Familiarity with applying MITRE ATT&CK or similar frameworks in enterprise environments

Understanding of how compliance frameworks such as PCI DSS and HITRUST impact security design and considerations
